name: Seapherd
description:
Seapherd Atlantis has sunken for millennia, it’s people have adapted to stay hidden and protect their newly found peaceful underwater existence away from the humans and their troubles above.

Thus only a select high-caste warriors are allowed to step outside the bounds of the city, to complete high-importance tasks.

As a young Atlantean by the name of ‘Shrimp’ you are looking to prove your worth by being one of these brave people and going on a mission to protect a noble’s highly priced flock of Sheepfish. 
These Sheepfish provide very important resource for your society in the form of growing a special coat of Woolshells. Armed with your Harpoon and a little magic, it is Your task to lead the herd to the lush pastures together with your trusty Dogfish companion.

Traverse atmospheric underwater landscape and protect the Sheepfish from any danger you might encounter in this immersive VR experience. 

 Are You up for the challenge?

The Game is in an early development stage. Credits:

Henrik Brunsvik - Team Lead & Programmer
James Sinclair Stokke - Programmer
Julia Lund Stokke - Artist
Wiebke Lilli Frei - Artist & Vision Keeper
Erik Nohr - Designer
David André Lindeberg Rotmo - Designer & Programmer
